allFeatures: Toyota Safety Sense P forward collision mitigation ~ Pre-Collision System with Pedestrian Detection ~ Rear mounted camera ~ Lane Departure Alert (LDA) w/Steering Assist ~ Dynamic Radar Cruise Control (DRCC) ~ Brake assist system ~ Cruise control with steering wheel mounted controls ~ Primary monitor touchscreen ~ 1.8L I-4 DOHC ~  VVT-i variable valve control ~  engine with 132HP ~ Vehicle Sway Warning driver attention alert ~ Bluetooth wireless audio streaming ~ Automatic High Beams (AHB) auto high-beam headlights ~ Immobilizer ~ Bluetooth handsfree wireless device connectivity ~ Entune external memory control ~ Electronic stability control system
